arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّكُمۡ وَجَهۡرَكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُونَ
translation: He is Allah in the heavens and on earth[1]. He knows your secrets and what you reveal, and knows whatever you earn.
footnotes: [1] Who is rightfully worshiped by the dwellers of these two realms.
